table: Total Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross

context: Property, Plant and Equipment. Property, plant and equipment is stated at cost. Maintenance and repair costs are expensed as incurred. Depreciation is calculated using the straight-line method using estimated useful lives of 5 to 40 years for buildings and building improvements and 3 to 15 years for machinery and equipment. A summary of property, plant and equipment is shown below: Depreciation expense was $27.2 million, $22.5 million and $22.0 million in fiscal 2019, fiscal 2018 and fiscal 2017, respectively. As of April 27, 2019 and April 28, 2018, capital expenditures recorded in accounts payable totaled $6.4 million and $9.0 million, respectively.
